text: On 16 January 2025, National Liberation Army (ELN) militants launched several attacks against FARC dissidents in the of Colombia. At least 100 people have been killed in the attacks, with others injured, kidnapped, and displaced. ==Notes== ==References== Category:2025 crimes Category:2020s in Colombia Category:Crime in South America Category:Mass murder in the 2020s Category:January 2025 events Category:Terrorist incidents in the 2020s
title: 2025 Catatumbo clashes
